CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Project Planning"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Initial Inquiry (RFI/Pre-Qual)"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "ROM"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "RFQ/RFP"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Bid Preparation"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Bid Submittal"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiation"))), Actual_Contract_Value__c , Null)
CustomField.label: Total $ value of won/lost/cnclld opps
